text: This is a complete list of the U.S. states, federal district, and its major territories ordered by total area, land area, and water area. Total area Land area Water State federal district or territory Rank sq mi km² Rank sq mi km² % land Rank sq mi km² % water Minor Outlying Islands -- -- -- -- Contiguous United States Total 50 states and District of Columbia Total All U.S. territory Total File:Map of USA highlighting Alaska.png|Alaska is the largest state in total area, land area, and water area. File:AustinSkyline.jpeg|Despite being the second largest state, Texas is only 40% of the total area of the largest state, Alaska. File:Map of USA highlighting Montana.png|Montana is larger than every state it borders; only Alaska and Wyoming have a lower population density. File:LightningVolt Lake Michigan Sunset.jpg|Sunset on Lake Michigan. Michigan is second behind Alaska in water area. ==References== Notes Category:Geography of the United States Area, List of U.S. states and territories by
title: List of U.S. states and territories by area
